name: Break The Logs
description:
Here is the last game that i made with a classmate. We thought of making a Hyper casual style game that is trending nowadays and the lumberjack theme is good to make a game. In the game, you are trying to cut the colorful part with an ax moving in different styles (hold and throw-release kind of game). 

There are 20 levels for now. We wanted the players to find the game challenging and we wanted the game give them the ambition to finish the game.
